title: Home and Away's Jake Ryan and girlfriend Alice take baby Wolf out
text:
Home and Away's Jake Ryan and his DJ girlfriend Alice Quiddington welcomed their first child together, son Wolf William Ryan, earlier this month.

And on Thursday, the couple looked to be relishing parenthood while out and about in Sydney.

The 36-year-old actor cradled the newborn, while Alice showed off her post-baby body in black athletic attire.

His best role yet! Home and Away star Jake Ryan, 36, doted on newborn son Wolf while on a casual stroll with DJ girlfriend Alice Quiddington, in Sydney on Thursday

Jake cut a casual figure in a blue tank top, which he teamed with beige shorts, thongs and a blue and white cap.

The star, well-known for playing bad boy Robbo on Home and Away, cradled Wolf, who looked cute as a button in a white striped top and green shorts.

Jake pushed Wolf's pram while enjoying a leisurely stroll with Alice and their dog.

Alice revealed her post-baby figure in a black tank top by Jodhi Meares' label The Upside, matching workout shorts and a jacket tied around her hips.

Happily family: The actor cut a casual figure and was seen pushing Wolf in his pram, alongside Alice and their dog

The artist kept light on her feet with pink Nike trainers, and added reflective narrow-frame sunglasses and gold jewellery to the look.

Alice styled her hair out and in a middle parting, and appeared to go makeup-free.

Alice announced their son's birth in an Instagram post on October 7, sharing an adorable photo of the newborn.

'We finally welcomed our little man into the world,' she wrote in the caption. 'One of the most intense but incredible experiences of my life.

Doting mother: Alice showed off her post-baby body in black athletic attire, while carrying Wolf on her chest

'So much new-found respect for this body and what it has done and continues to do.'

Alice added that Jake was already every inch the doting dad.

'Jake Ryan is already super dad status and was the most amazing support to me throughout the whole pregnancy and birth.

'We're just taking some time to rest and enjoy our little love bubble and new family member.'

The couple announced the news they were expecting in May this year, and are believed to have been dating since February.
description: The soap star was pictured cradling newborn son Wolf, while out on a leisurely stroll in Sydney on Thursday.
authors: Kristy Johnson For Daily Mail Australia
